external_games.name: Bing in Wonderland - Wings & Weapon Looks - Dragon Slayer

name: Bing in Wonderland: Wings & Weapon Looks - Dragon Slayer
summary: This DLC includes: 1 new gorgeous appearance for each weapon, for a total of 5 weapon appearances for 5 different weapons. A pair of wings with a matching theme to the weapon appearance. While using the wings, holding the spacebar in mid-air allows for a slow descent. Equip at the weapon NPC.
